result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason L Glawe

defendant.name: Glawe, Jason L
defendant.address: W245 N6038 Maris Drive, Sussex, WI 53089

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Wisconsin Community Service non-compliance letter received and filed.

Defendant Jason L Glawe in court, in custody, with attorney Kevin G Keane.   Ted S. Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to have this case dismissed and read-in to 14CF424, Court grants the State's motion.
Wisconsin Community Service compliance letter received and filed.

Defendant Jason L Glawe in court with attorney Kevin G Keane.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests a status/trial date. Court will set a status/trial on 14CF424 and 14CF585 to trail along.  Hearing scheduled for October 16, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jason L Glawe in court with attorney Kevin G Keane.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense states his client is being considered for drug court and requests another date. Court grants request.  Hearing scheduled for August 25, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 11, 2014 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Jason L Glawe in court with attorney Kevin G Keane.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Keane indicates discovery has not all been received and is requesting a new date.
Court will adjourn.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 11, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Court received information from Wisconsin Community Services regarding defendant's compliance/non-compliance.
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.   Defendant to report/comply with Wisconsin Community Services Pretrial Supervision Program.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

Defendant Jason L Glawe in court with attorney Kevin G Keane.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsi  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED. 
.  Hearing scheduled for June 30, 2014 at 09:30 am.
